message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL

The paper proposes a novel approach to incremental learning using a brain-inspired model. This approach involves representing each image class as centroids and using the distance of the test image to the n closest centroids for classification. This suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), neural networks (cs.NE), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and natural language processing (cs.CL) as these are all relevant areas for incremental learning and classification tasks. However, given the focus on deep learning and image classification, cs.LG and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories.
